summary: A test suite that validates the TableTransformer model implementation, checking its configuration, initialization, forward behavior, attention mechanisms, token embedding resizing, gradient handling, support for different visual backbones, processing of greyscale inputs, generation without explicit input IDs, and integration with an object detection head.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the TableTransformer model for enterprise applications such as document analysis and table extraction, reducing risk before deployment and supporting continuous integration pipelines.
